body_html:
As stated above, I am running tensorflow-gpu 1.2.1, installed via pip on Ubuntu 16.04.2 x86_64 (following https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux), with Python version 2.7.12. CUDA is 8.0.61-1 from the nVidia repo, and cuDNN is 5.1.10. My GPU is an nVidia GTX 1080 Ti with 11172 MiB of memory.

The exact command I entered is:
CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1 python mintrans.py

body:
As stated above,  I am running tensorflow-gpu 1.2.1, installed via pip on Ubuntu 16.04.2 x86_64 (following https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux), with Python version 2.7.12. CUDA is 8.0.61-1 from the nVidia repo, and cuDNN is 5.1.10. My GPU is an nVidia GTX 1080 Ti with 11172 MiB of memory.

The exact command I entered is:
`CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1 python mintrans.py`
